graphs.title: TP
graphs.name: TruePos
graphs.content: True Positives: Distribution of the number of actual positive observations correctly predicted as positive.

graphs.title: FP
graphs.name: FalPos
graphs.content: False Positives: Distribution of the number of negative observations incorrectly predicted as positive.

graphs.title: FN
graphs.name: FalNeg
graphs.content: False Negatives: Distribution of the number of positive observations incorrectly predicted as negative.

graphs.title: TN
graphs.name: TrueNeg
graphs.content: True Negatives: Distribution of the number of negative observations correctly predicted as negative.

graphs.title: FNR
graphs.name: Fnr
graphs.content:
False Negative Rate: Distribution of the proportion of actual positive observations that are predicted incorrectly

P[d=0|Y=1]

graphs.title: FPR
graphs.name: Fpr
graphs.content:
False Positive Rate: Distribution of the proportion of actual negative observations that are predicted correctly

P[d=1|Y=0]

graphs.title: PPV (Precision)
graphs.name: PPV
graphs.content:
Positive Predictive Value (Precision): Distribution of the proportion of positive predictions that are actual positive observations.

P[Y=1|d=1]

graphs.title: NPV
graphs.name: NPV
graphs.content:
Negative Predictive Value: Distribution of the proportion negative predictions that are actually negative observations.

P[Y=0|d=0]

graphs.title: TPR (Recall/Sensitivity)
graphs.name: Sens
graphs.content:
True Positive Rate (Recall/Sensitivity): Distribution of the proportion of actual positive observations that are predicted correctly.

P[d=1|Y=1]

graphs.title: TNR (Specificity)
graphs.name: Spec
graphs.content:
True Negative Rate (Specificity): Distribution of the proportion of actual negative observations that are predicted incorrectly

P[d=0|Y=0]

graphs.title: FDR
graphs.name: Fdr
graphs.content:
False Discovery Rate: Distribution of the proportion of positive predictions incorrectly that are actually negative observations.

P[Y=0|d=1]

graphs.title: FOR
graphs.name: For
graphs.content:
False Omission Rate: Distribution of the proportion negative predictions that are actually positive observations.

P[Y=1|d=0]
